theory: Time & Work is an important topic in Quantitative Aptitude. Start with basic concepts, then learn standard methods and shortcuts. Practice easy questions first and move to timed mixed questions.
all_approaches: Understand the core definition and common question patterns.
Break each question into known facts and unknown target.
Use elimination when options are close.
Track mistakes and revise formulas/patterns daily.
